column2: "Na iyi nye asodzi ho afɔr ho mbra: ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔndze mu adzekrɔnkrɔn."
"Beebi mbrɛ woku ɔhyew afɔr abowa no
column3: hɔ ara so na wonku asodzi ho afɔr abowa no; na ɔmfa no bɔgyaa mpetse afɔrmbukyia no ho nhyia."

column2: "Na onyi ne seradze nyinara mbra
column3: seradze dua no
column4: nye seradze a ɔkata ayamudze no ho no
column7: nye seradze a ɔwɔ ho wɔ sisiw mu no

column2: "na ɔsɔfo no nhyew no wɔ afɔrmbukyia do nyɛ ogya afɔr mma EWURADZE: ɔyɛ asodzi ho afɔr."
"Asɔfo ebusuakuw no mu ɔbanyin biara ndzi bi: wondzi no wɔ mbrɛ ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔn: ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔndze mu adzekrɔnkrɔn."
"Dɛ mbrɛ bɔn ho afɔr tse no
column3: dɛmara na asodzi ho afɔr tse: mbra kor na ɔda ho: ɔsɔfo no a ɔdze pata no

column2: "Na ɔsɔfo a ɔbɔ nyimpa biara ne hyew afɔr no
column3: ɔhyew afɔr a ɔabɔ no no nwoma no nyɛ ɔsɔfo no dze."

column2: "Na edziban afɔr biara a wɔto wɔ fononoo mu
column3: nye dza wɔyɛ no wɔ kyesɛn mu
column5: nyɛ ɔsɔfo a ɔdze ba no dze."

column2: "Na edziban afɔr biara a wɔdze ngo afrɔw
column3: anaa wesee no
column4: nyɛ Aaron ne mbabanyin nyinara dze
column5: baako nya dɛ mbrɛ baako so nya."

column2: "Na iyi nye asomdwee afɔr a obi bɔ ma EWURADZE no ho mbra."
"Sɛ ɔyɛ no aseda afɔr dze ba a
column3: ɔno
column4: aseda afɔr a ɔdze ba no nyɛ epitsi tatar a wɔdze ngo afrɔw."

column2: "Mbɔrkaw boodoo tatar na ɔmfa nka n’ayɛyɛdze nye n’asomdwee afɔr ho mbra mbɛyɛ aseda."
"Na ɔmfa ayɛyɛdze biara mu kor mbrɛ mbɛyɛ ɔmado afɔr mma EWURADZE; ɔsɔfo a ɔdze asomdwee afɔr bɔgyaa petse no na ɔnyɛ nedze."
"Na n’aseda asomdwee afɔr no nam no wondzi no wɔ n’ayɛyɛdze da no ara; mma onngya mu bi ma onnkodu adzekyee."
"Mbom sɛ n’ayɛyɛdze yɛ anohoba
column3: anaa ayamuyi afɔr a
column4: wondzi no da no ara a ɔbɔ n’afɔr no: na no mu dza ɔka ma adze kye do no wondzi:"

column2: "na mbom afɔr no ne nam a ɔbɛka ekodu da a otsia ebiasa no
column3: wɔmfa gya nhyew no."

column2: "Na sɛ wodzi n’asomdwee afɔr no ne nam biara da a otsia ebiasa no a
column3: wɔremmpen do
column4: nkyii so worummbu mma nyia ɔdze ba no: ɔyɛ ekyiwadze
column5: na ɔkra a obedzi bi no bɔsoa no mbusu."

column2: "Na nam a aka biribiara a no ho nntsew no
column3: mma wonndzi; wɔmfa ogya nhyew no. Na nam no dze
column4: obiara a no ho tsew ndzi bi:"

column2: "na ɔkra a odzi asomdwee afɔr a ɔyɛ EWURADZE dze no ne nam bi
column3: na n’efifidze wɔ no ho no
column4: ɔkra no wobotwa no efi ne man mu akyen."

column2: "Na sɛ nyimpa biara ka biribiara a no ho nntsew nyimpa n’efifidze
column3: anaa abowa a no ho nntsew
column4: anaa ekyiwadze biara a no ho nntsew
column5: na odzi asomdwee afɔr a ɔyɛ EWURADZE dze no ne nam bi no
column6: ɔkra no wobotwa no efi ne man mu akyen."

column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
"Na dza noara ewu ne seradze
column3: nye dza abowa atsetsew no ne seradze no
column4: wɔmfa nyɛ edwuma biara: mbom dzi na mma hom nndzi bi."

column2: "Na obiara a odzi abowa a adasa dze bi bɔ ogya afɔr ma EWURADZE no ne seradze bi no
column3: mekyerɛ ɔkra a odzi no wobotwa no efi ne man mu akyen."

column2: "Na mma hom nndzi bɔgya biara
column3: anoma anaa aketsebowa dze

column2: "Obiara a odzi bɔgya biara no
column3: no wobotwa no efi ne man mu akyen."

column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
column5: Nyia ɔbɔ n’asomdwee afɔr ma EWURADZE no ɔmfa n’asomdwee afɔr no mu ayɛyɛdze mbrɛ EWURADZE:"

column2: "ɔmfa noara ne nsa mfa EWURADZE gya afɔr no mbra: seradze no nye nyan no na ɔmfa mbra
column3: ama nyan no wɔaatow no ayɛ ɔtow afɔr wɔ EWURADZE enyim."

column2: "Na ɔsɔfo no nhyew seradze no wɔ afɔrmbukyia no do: na nyan no nyɛ Aaron nye ne mbabanyin dze."
"Na aserɛ nyimfa no hom mfa nyɛ hom asomdwee afɔr mu ɔmado afɔr mma ɔsɔfo no."
"Aaron ne mbabanyin mu nyia ɔdze asomdwee afɔr no bɔgyaa
column3: nye seradze ba no
column4: nye aserɛ nyimfa no nyɛ ne kyɛfa."

column2: "Na ɔtow nyan no nye ɔmado serɛ no mafa wɔ Israelmba hɔn asomdwee afɔr no mu
column3: na medze mama ɔsɔfo Aaron nye ne mbabanyin dɛ daa ahyɛdze a ofi Israelmba hɔ."

column2: "Iyi nye Aaron no ngosera kyɛfa
column3: nye ne mbabanyin hɔn ngosera kyɛfa a ofi EWURADZE ogya afɔr mu
column4: wɔ da a ɔdze hɔn bae dɛ wombedzi EWURADZE asɔfoe no a."

column2: "EWURADZE hyɛɛ dɛ wɔmfa mma hɔn wɔ da a ɔseraa hɔn ngo fii Israelmba mu no. Ɔyɛ daa ahyɛdze wɔ hɔn ebusuasantsen mu."
"Iyi nye mbra a ɔda hɔ ma ɔhyew afɔr
column3: edziban afɔr

column2: "EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses wɔ bepɔw Sinai do
column3: wɔ da a ɔhyɛɛ Israelmba dɛ wɔmfa hɔn ayɛyɛdze mbrɛ EWURADZE
